alert: ⚠️ CRITICAL: Unauthorized Person Detected in Campus Construction Zone!
recommended_action: Immediately dispatch a security unit to the Construction Zone (near CAM_CONSTRUCTION_SITE) to locate, identify, and escort the unauthorized individual out of the restricted area. Advise responding officers that the individual may lack proper safety gear.
explanation: An unidentified individual has entered a high-risk, restricted construction zone. This constitutes a significant safety liability and a security breach. The high confidence detection, coupled with an audio anomaly, warrants an immediate response to mitigate potential injury, theft, or vandalism.
risk_factors: Intrusion into a restricted, high-hazard area
Significant personal safety risk to the individual
Potential for theft or vandalism of equipment/materials

source_event.description: Detected: 1 person. 1 unauthorized person(s). in Campus Construction Zone. Risk factors: Unauthorized person in restricted zone; Person in construction zone - safety gear check required

risk_factors: Person in construction zone - safety gear check required
